description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for the login screen of a mobile application. It includes UI components such as input fields, buttons, and navigation logic for user authentication flow.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the login screen interface.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the login form, user inputs, and navigation logic.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form validation, simulates login delay, shows a snackbar, and navigates to the home route.

methods.name: _headerAppBar
methods.description: Builds the AppBar widget for the login screen.

methods.name: _heroBackground
methods.description: Creates the background gradient decoration for the login screen.
